str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To do that which is good. From agathopoios; to be a well-doer.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To do that which is good. From agathopoios; to be a well-doer.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: Of what sort. From the base of pou and hoios; individualizing interrogative what sort of, or which one.
From chairo; graciousness, of manner or act.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Sinning, sinful, depraved, detestable. From hamartano; sinful, i.e. A sinner.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Neuter 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
